body.name: Oster Extra Large Single Pull French Door Turbo Convection Toaster Oven w/ 2 Removable Baking Racks, 60-Minute Timer, & Adjustable Temperature, Black
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by always quality.
features: Innovative Turbo convection baking and customizable temperature settings serve a dual purpose by not only expediting the cooking process
Experience the purposeful engineering that simplifies your cooking routine by allowing you to navigate and utilize your oven with just one hand effortlessly
Shutoff timer serves a dual purpose, ensuring that your dishes are flawlessly cooked while providing a safety feature to prevent any overcooking mishaps
Elevate your culinary experience with the flexibility provided by the two oven-baking racks, allowing you to create delicious dishes with ease
Versatile toaster oven, equipped with toasting, baking, and broiling functions, boasts an extra-large interior for your culinary convenience
body.description: The Oster French Door Turbo Convection Toaster Oven is the ultimate multitasking solution for your culinary adventures, seamlessly accommodating all your toasting, baking, and broiling needs. Its innovative design allows you to access the spacious interior effortlessly through a single-door pull function, streamlining your cooking process. The appliance offers unparalleled cooking flexibility within this extra-large space, equipped with two oven racks, ensuring that space constraints do not limit your creative culinary endeavors. The inclusion of Turbo Convection cooking technology further elevates your cooking experience by reducing cook time and delivering an impeccably even browning finish. To guarantee your peace of mind, the toaster oven features a 60-minute automatic shutoff timer, preventing concerns about overcooking. Beyond its exceptional performance, the Oster French Door Turbo Convection Toaster Oven prioritizes convenience in every aspect, from cooking to cleanup. The cleaning process becomes a breeze after you've crafted your latest gastronomic masterpiece. The oven racks and crumb tray effortlessly slide out, facilitating a quick wipe down of interior and exterior surfaces. This thoughtful design ensures that maintaining the appliance is as efficient as using it. Once cleaned, effortlessly reassemble the components, and this portable kitchen companion will be ready and waiting for your next culinary adventure. The Oster French Door Turbo Convection Toaster Oven combines performance and convenience, making it an indispensable asset for those who value both efficiency and exceptional cooking results.
